game.name: Threads of Destiny
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Enjoy another classic 16-bit RPG from Warfare Studios! A young girl has the ability to completely heal anyone with a simple touch. Follow Illya and her two brothers on a quest to understand the gift she's been given.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enjoy another classic 16-bit RPG from Warfare Studios! A young girl has the ability to completely heal anyone with a simple touch. Follow Illya and her two brothers on a quest to understand the gift she's been given.
